Title: The Fire
Plot: The Office is forced into the parking lot for the day when a fire starts in the kitchen.  To ease everyone's boredom, Jim suggests a game of ""Desert Island"" and ""Who Would You Do?,"" where certain staff members reveal a little too much information about themselves. Throughout the day, Michael talks business with Ryan, leaving Dwight feeling left out.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language and sexual references
GuestStars: Amy Adams, Angela Kinsey, Brian Baumgartner, David Denman, Kate Flannery, Leslie David Baker, Mindy Kaling, Oscar Nu√±ez, Paul Lieberstein, Phyllis Smith, Devon Abner
